p: Table 5 shows the effects of RC supplementation on egg quality from weeks 1 to 12. There was no significant difference in egg weight, eggshell strength, Haugh unit, or shell thickness between the control group and those that received RC. However, the yolk color scores in all RC-treated groups (0.5% RC, 1% RC, and 2% RC) were significantly ( P<0.0001) higher than the control.
